snippet: Perhaps it was the 25 mph winds. Or the slower-than-expected hard courts. Or maybe simply that Serena Williams hadn't played a match in a month....
lead_paragraph: Perhaps it was the 25 mph winds. Or the slower-than-expected hard courts. Or maybe simply that Serena Williams hadn't played a match in a month.

headline.print_headline: Serena Williams Wins Rio Opener; 1st Match Since Wimbledon
headline.main: Serena Williams Wins Rio Opener; 1st Match Since Wimbledon
